message: Hello Bob, I'm offering this product for $14,000. I believe it will be highly beneficial for you.
Thank you for your offer, Alice. I appreciate your suggestion, but I am only able to pay up to $10,000 for this product. Would you be willing to consider this price?
Thanks for your counteroffer, Bob. I understand your position, but $10,000 is significantly below its value to me. I could consider letting it go for $13,000.
I appreciate your willingness to negotiate, Alice. Considering the value of the product to me, I would like to propose a price of $12,500. This is my final offer.
